DOC.brief_title: Changes Induced Breakfast Cereals Enriched With Omega-3 Lipidic Profile
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator perform intervention include 133 woman ( age 25-70 year ) . Participants randomly single-blind distributed three group : Group 1 ( n=38 ) consume cereal omega-3 ( Cw-3 + D ) , cereal ( C ) diet ( D ) , Group 2 ( n=38 ) . Volunteers consume ( C ) + ( D ) Group 3 ( n=37 ) consume diet . All group follow limit levels-cholesterol diet . Circulating total cholesterol , HDL-cholesterol , LDL-cholesterol , triglyceride glucose determine begin end 30-day test . Statistical analysis carry use STATGRAPHICS Centurion XV software ( StatPoint Technologies , Inc. Warrington , VA , USA ) ; likewise , significance define p ≤ 0.05 . Data report mean ± standard error mean ( sem ) . Intra-group statistical comparison perform use follow hypothesis test , parametric non-parametric : t-test , sign test sign rank test pair sample . Inter-group statistical comparison perform use one-way analysis variance Kruskal-Wallis hypothesis test . Also , Fisher 's least significant difference ( LSD ) Multiple Range Test Tukey 's honestly significant difference ( HSD ) use order determine mean significantly different others . In addition , Generalized Multiple Regression use statistically analyze relationship variation lipid profile different factor include study .
